sections.description: Get more subscribers for your web page with this plugin!
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2016-08-20
  • First version released.

Version 1.1 Release Date 2016-10-10
  • Fixed auto updating.

Version 1.2 Release Date 2016-12-3
  • Big update for documentation and features.
  • Fixed some minor issues.
Version 1.3 Release Date 2017-02-03
  • Added multisite support
